content.rendered:
Directed by Akarsh Khurana

Written by Akarsh Khurana. Adhir Bhat. Hussain Dalal

Cast Irrfan Khan (Shaukat). Dulquer Salmaan (Avinash). Mithila Palkar (Tanya). Amala Akkineni (Tahira). Akash Khurana (Prakash Rajpurohit- Avinash’s Father). Kriti Kharbanda (Rumana). Donna Munshi (Tasneem). Abir Abrar (Air Hostess neighbour). Beena Banerjee (Tahira’s mother). Siddharth Menon (Rajat- The Groom). Adrika Shetty (Laxmi Nambiar- The Bride). Sameer Saxena (Dr. Raghu- Rumana’s Husband). Kallirroi Tziafeta (The Backpacker Girl). Richard John Lovatt (Male Backpacker). Nipun Dharmadhikari (Amey- Avinash’s workmate). Adhaar Khurana (Rahul- Avinash’s Boss). Sarang Sathaye (Sanjay- Avinash’s friend (as Sarang Sathye)). Shubhrajyoti Barat (Mr. Nambiar (as Shubrajyoti Bharat)). Ambika Mohan (Mrs. Nambiar). Jan Bostock (Britisher 1). Richard Bhakti Klein (Britisher 2 (as R. Bhakti Klein)) . Habib Azmi (Aziz Hussain). Prassanth Kumar Chandran (Goon 2 (as Prasanthkumar Chandran)). Varghees Cherai (Nambiar’s House Help). Rohit Dandwani (Office Employee). Boloram Das (Cargo Officer). Ramashrit Joshi (Shayri Writer). Shonita Joshi (Veera). Avinash Kuri (Office employee). Swaylee Loughnane (DCI Joe Harvey). Sanjeevkumar Nair (Hostel Warden). Muzammil S. Qureshi (Suspicious Character). Sunil Rodrigues (Goon 1). Kashin Shetty (Office Peon). Prashant Singh

Language Hindi. Malayalam

Producers Prassanth Kumar Chandran. Priti Gupta. Pashan Jal. Salona Bains Joshi. Sonia Kanwar. Ankur Khanna. Sanjeevkumar Nair. Ronnie Screwvala. Shubh Shivdasani

Production Ishka Films. RSV. Reverie Entertainment
